name: Inspire Labs
tagline: We create useful web solutions on time
description:
Our mission: To improve people’s lives by creating useful web solutions on time
We carry out our mission on the basis of a professional team that is built around a platform common for all the team members.
The platform and the cornerstone of our company: our values (innovation, agile, responsibility, ambition and partnership).
Our services: webdevelopment, FB  Apps, RWD portals, e-commerce, B2B  solutions, integrations, maintenance.
